name: Sip Song Thai Restaurant
address: 3626 16th Ave W, Vancouver BC V6R 3C4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Tom Yum Soup (Tom Yum Goong) large for 3-5 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Hot and sour soup with shrimp, lemongrass, mushrooms, tomato, lime leaves, cilantro, and chili paste.

hasMenuItem.name: M2. Thai Braised Whole Pork Legs with Rice (Khao Ka Moo) / ข้าวขาหมู for 3-5 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Thai braised pork leg dish , alongside hard-boiled eggs, choy sum, and spicy vinegar dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: S5. Grilled Thai Skewers (Moo Ping) (Gai Ping)
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. 3 pieces. Thin slices of juicy meats are marinated in a blend of spices with Thai dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: S1. Tom Yum Soup (Tom Yum Goong) / ต้มยำกุ้ง.  small for 1-2 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai hot and sour soup where the iconic flavors come from 3 herbs: lemongrass, galangal, and makrut (kaffir) lime leaves with prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1PK. Thai Boat Noodle with Pork Slices
hasMenuItem.description: Tender pork slices with your choice of egg, rice, or vermicelli noodles. Additional options include chicken, pork, beef, fish ball, pork ball, beef ball, or tiger prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: B3. Thai Milk Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Sweetened Thai tea blended with milk, offering a smooth and aromatic beverage experience.

hasMenuItem.name: S5. Grilled Thai Skewers (Moo Ping) (Gai Ping)
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. 3 pieces. Thin slices of juicy meats are marinated in a blend of spices with Thai dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: S6. Deep-Fried Soft-Shell Crab with Thai Dipping Sauce (Pu Nim Tod Kra Tium Pik)
hasMenuItem.description: Thai-style deep-fried soft-shell crabs.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Lemongrass Chicken Wings 6 pcs
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried chicken wings marinated with lemongrass, typically including garlic, black pepper, and soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Thai Beef Skewer
Grilled Pork Jowls
S1. Pomelo Salad with jumbo prawns (Yam Som O) / ยำส้มโอ
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai pomelo salad combines juicy citrus with herbs and a sweet, tart, and spicy dressing with prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: S4. Chicken Satay (Gai Satay) / สะเต๊ะไก
hasMenuItem.description: 3 pieces. Skewered marinated meats that are grilled and served with a peanut dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Tom Yum Soup (Tom Yum Goong) large for 3-5 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Hot and sour soup with shrimp, lemongrass, mushrooms, tomato, lime leaves, cilantro, and chili paste.

hasMenuItem.name: S1. Tom Yum Soup (Tom Yum Goong) / ต้มยำกุ้ง.  small for 1-2 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai hot and sour soup where the iconic flavors come from 3 herbs: lemongrass, galangal, and makrut (kaffir) lime leaves with prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: M2. Thai Braised Whole Pork Legs with Rice (Khao Ka Moo) / ข้าวขาหมู for 3-5 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Thai braised pork leg dish , alongside hard-boiled eggs, choy sum, and spicy vinegar dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: M5. Thai Green Curry (Kaeng Khiao Wan) / แกงเขียวหวาน. for 2 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai dish consisting of green curry paste cooked in coconut milk with meat added, such as chicken, beef, pork, or prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: Thai Yellow Curry for 2 ppl
Thai Style Mixed Vegetables
M1. Thai Volcano Ribs (Leng Saap) / เล้ง แซ่. for 4 - 6 ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Huge mountain of pork bone ribs loaded in a bold, rich broth, loaded with countless chilies and fresh cilantro.

hasMenuItem.name: M4. Thai Red Curry (Gaeng Phed) / แกงเผ็ด. for 2ppl
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai dish consisting of red curry paste cooked in coconut milk with meat added, such as chicken, beef, pork, or prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1PK. Thai Boat Noodle with Pork Slices
hasMenuItem.description: Tender pork slices with your choice of egg, rice, or vermicelli noodles. Additional options include chicken, pork, beef, fish ball, pork ball, beef ball, or tiger prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1B. Thai Boat Noodle with Beef Slices
hasMenuItem.description: Thai boat noodle with beef slices. Your choice of Egg Noodle, Rice Noodle, or Vermicelli. Add Chicken, Pork, Beef, Fish Ball, Pork Ball, Beef Ball, or Tiger Prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1FB. Thai Boat Noodle with Fish Balls
hasMenuItem.description: Thai boat noodle with fish balls. Noodle choices include egg, rice, or vermicelli. Add chicken, pork, beef, fish or pork balls, beef balls, or tiger prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1PB. Thai Boat Noodle with Pork Balls
hasMenuItem.description: Boat noodle soup with pork balls. Choose from egg, rice, or vermicelli noodles. Add chicken, pork, beef, fish or pork balls, beef balls, or tiger prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1BB. Thai Boat Noodle with Beef Balls
hasMenuItem.description: Thai boat noodle with beef balls. Choose from egg, rice, or vermicelli noodles. Add chicken, pork, fish ball, pork ball, beef ball, or tiger prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1TP. Thai Boat Noodle with Tiger Prawns
hasMenuItem.description: Thai boat noodle with tiger prawns. Choice of Egg Noodle, Rice Noodle, or Vermicelli. Additional options include Chicken, Pork, Beef, Fish Ball, Pork Ball, Beef Ball.

hasMenuItem.name: NR2. Tom Yum Noodle (Guay Tiew Tom Yum) / ก๋วยเตี๋ยวต้มยำ
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Tom yum noodle soup is an easy, slightly heartier take on the Thai classic. Perfectly cooked prawns, mushrooms, and al dente rice noodles in a slightly sour, spicy coconut broth.

hasMenuItem.name: NR6. Thai Red Curry with Pork, Beef, Chicken or Prawn with Rice / แกงเผ็ด
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai dish consisting of red curry paste cooked in coconut milk with meat added, such as chicken, beef, pork, or prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: NR7. Thai Green Curry with Pork, Beef, Chicken or Prawn with Rice / แกงเผ็ด
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Thai dish consisting of green curry paste cooked in coconut milk with meat added, such as chicken, beef, pork, or prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: M2. Thai Braised Pork Legs with Rice (Khao Ka Moo) / ข้าวขาหมู
hasMenuItem.description: Braised pork legs, seasoned with five spices, served over jasmine rice. Typically includes pickled mustard greens, boiled egg, and a side of spicy garlic sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: NR8. Jasmine Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed jasmine rice, often served as a fragrant and simple base for various dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1. Thai Boat Noodle with Pork Stews and Pork Balls (Guay Tiew Reua) / ก๋วยเตี๋ยวเรือ
hasMenuItem.description: Thai-style noodle dish with a strong flavor with the addition of the complex broth exuding notes of cinnamon, soy, star anise, lemongrass, galangal, pandan, and more. The finishing touches are then applied with a touch of garlic oil, a few sprigs of fragrant coriander, a sprinkling of finely sliced spring onions, and some crunchy fried pork crisps.

hasMenuItem.name: NR1C. Thai Boat Noodle with Chicken Slices
hasMenuItem.description: Egg, rice, or vermicelli noodles. Choose from chicken, pork, beef, fish ball, pork ball, beef ball, or tiger prawns.

hasMenuItem.name: D2. Thai Coconut Pandan Pudding (Khanom Tuay)
hasMenuItem.description: The coconut custard has 2 layers: the sweet chewy coconut pandan-based layer on the bottom with the thick coconut cream on top.

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Fried Durian Balls 4 pcs
B3. Thai Milk Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Sweetened Thai tea blended with milk, offering a smooth and aromatic beverage experience.

hasMenuItem.name: B1. Thai Signature Drinks
hasMenuItem.description: Special drinks that made with butterfly peas and lime juice.

hasMenuItem.name: B2. Lemongrass Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Brewed with fresh lemongrass, this tea typically includes subtle hints of other herbs, offering a refreshing and soothing experience.

hasMenuItem.name: B5. Salty Lemon Soda
hasMenuItem.description: Soda water mixed with a hint of salt and freshly squeezed lemon juice.

hasMenuItem.name: B6. Soft Drink
hasMenuItem.description: Cola, Diet Cola, or Lemon-Lime. Refreshing soda options.
